## AlbumOptions.metadataDir property

The path to a directory containing album metadata file. If this is specified, the metadata file is assumed to match the album's directory name. This cannot be specified with `metadataFile`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
metadataDir?: string;
```
